Name: Weelco VR
About the game: Weelco is a big gallery of free high quality (4k) VR 360° videos. By using Weelco app and VR headset you can easily dive into virtual reality world - watch best 360° videos, subscribe to interesting channels and stay updated with latest VR trending videos or create your own channel and upload your VR art. Install the app and experience virtual reality emotions choosing from various categories: - VR horror - VR travel guide - VR music - VR roller coaster - VR movie trailers and more. New videos every day! User-friendly interface and multi-language voice search allow you to enjoy virtual world 100% handsfree: you can navigate through the app, choose videos by categories, easily play and pause videos. Weelco VR has NO advertising/pop-up icons. Download Weelco VR for mobile: iOS, Android, Xiaomi.
